# Problem 1

**Penguins dataset summary.**


```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
view(penguins)

```
The variables of note included in this dataset are species, island of origin, bill and flipper length, bill depth, body mass, and sex. The dataset is `r nrow(penguins)` rows long and `r ncol(penguins)` variables wide. The mean flipper length is `r mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)` mm.
